org.jacorb.orb.miop

Class MIOPListener

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.omg.CORBA.LocalObject
      • org.omg.ETF._ListenerLocalBase
        • org.jacorb.orb.etf.ListenerBase
          • org.jacorb.orb.miop.MIOPListener
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Configurable, LocalInterface, Object, IDLEntity, org.omg.ETF.Listener, org.omg.ETF.ListenerOperations

    public class MIOPListener
extends ListenerBase
    This ORB group MIOP listener. Manages the server connections listening to the groups multicast sockets.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Alysson Neves Bessani
    See Also:
    ServerMIOPConnection, Serialized Form
